alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 11:19AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow will affect southern Washington and southeastern Hancock Counties... At 1116 AM EST...An area of heavy snow was near Steuben, or 10 miles northeast of Bar Harbor. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Bar Harbor, Blue Hill, Machias, Lubec, Eastport, Cherryfield, Jonesport, Steuben, Harrington, Perry, Pembroke, Jonesboro, Columbia Falls, Cutler, Columbia, Deblois, Centerville, Millbridge and Hancock. This includes US Highway 1 between Hancock and Perry. * Winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow. * Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are occurring in this area of heavy snow. Icy roads are possible as the snow melts on the roads then quickly refreezes.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington
